message.entry: {0} はレガシ icdevice ではサポートされません。名前と値の引数 LegacyMode=false を使用して icdevice オブジェクトを作成してください。
ハードウェア インターフェイス オブジェクトはシリアル、tcpip、visa、または gpib オブジェクトでなければなりません。
The DRIVER and HWOBJ must be specified.
DRIVER must be a character vector or string.
HWOBJ must be an interface object.
HWOBJ must be a 1-by-1 interface object.
HWOBJ must be a valid interface object.
This driver requires a newer version of Instrument Control Toolbox
This driver was created with a newer version of the Instrument Control Toolbox

IVI-COM instrument drivers are not supported in 64-bit MATLAB. As an alternative, use an IVI-C driver or use instrument interfaces, like VISA, to configure your instrument using SCPI commands. Click here for more information.
The QueryInstrumentStatus is not enabled. Errors may not be properly reported.
DRIVER could not be found. The DRIVER must be on the MATLAB path.

IVI-COM functionality will no longer be available starting in MATLAB R2016a. 32-bit and 64-bit IVI-C drivers are supported on both 32-bit and 64-bit MATLAB, respectively. It is recommended to use the IVI-C driver instead of the IVI-COM driver.
